title: Competency-Based English Curriculum Design and Implementation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of secondary English curriculum and content-based instructional experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based blended learning environment, formative assessment-centered operation, and the need to strengthen practical competencies for changes in English language education curricula

learning_goals: Explain the core elements of a competency-based English curriculum (core competencies, standard competencies, learning outcomes) with over 80% accuracy.
Present step-by-step processes for transitioning from content-based to competency-based instructional materials development through actual case analysis.
Design and implement at least three formative assessment tools applicable in limited technological environments (primarily smartphone-based).

resources: Model Lesson Video (5 Minutes or Less)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
